hidd(8) BSD System Manager's Manual hidd(8)

NAME

hidd - The HID library userland daemon.

SYNOPSIS

NONE (launched by launchd)

DESCRIPTION

As the HID libraries expand, hidd is the place where things better done in userland reside. It is not invoked, nor does it have any options.
